name: DØD SØ FUBAR
description:
DEAD (in the) SEA, F####D BEYOND ANY REPAIR

DØD SØ FUBAR is a SHITTY MECH SIMULATOR and also RESOURCE MANAGEMENT SURVIVAL GAME made in two weekends for So Bad It's Good 2021 jam.

Quickly divert power between the mech's various system to DESTROY enemy fighters, DEFLECT attacks, and REPAIR your mech's ever dying hull.

/// /// ///

A SO BAD IT'S GOOD GAME by DANCINGENGIE

with MUSIC by THE EGOTWISTERS ["Monte Piana" & "Sunday Morning"]

/// /// ///

contains EXPLICIT LANGUAGE, FLASHING SPRITES and BLARING, LOUD SOUNDS
